subject: Going for Walks
message: Walking daily has improved my mood and mental clarity.

comments.text: Totally agree! Walking has been life-changing for me.

subject: Listening to Music
message: Listening to calming music before bed helps me sleep better.

subject: Meditation
message: Meditating for 10 minutes each morning brings me peace.

subject: Yoga
message: Yoga helps me relax and stretch out the tension.

subject: Journaling
message: Writing down my thoughts helps me process my emotions.

subject: Practicing Gratitude
message: Listing things I am grateful for keeps me grounded.

subject: Limiting Social Media
message: Reducing time on social media has reduced my anxiety.

comments.text: Social media detox is a must.

subject: Setting Small Goals
message: Setting achievable goals gives me a sense of purpose.

subject: Pet Therapy
message: Playing with my pet always lifts my spirits.

subject: Reading Books
message: Reading fiction helps me escape and relax.

subject: Therapy
message: Talking to a therapist has really helped me understand myself better.

subject: Spending Time in Nature
message: Being outside in nature calms me down.

subject: Connecting with Friends
message: Socializing with friends gives me a boost.

subject: Practicing Mindfulness
message: Being mindful helps me stay in the moment.

comments.text: Mindfulness is a great skill to have.

subject: Taking Breaks
message: Short breaks during the day help me recharge.

subject: Gardening
message: Taking care of plants relaxes me.

subject: Breathing Exercises
message: Simple breathing techniques help me stay calm.

subject: Drinking Herbal Tea
message: A cup of tea helps me unwind in the evening.

subject: Practicing Self-Compassion
message: Being kind to myself has improved my mental health.

subject: Using a Weighted Blanket
message: My weighted blanket helps me sleep better.

subject: Listening to Podcasts
message: Mental health podcasts give me new insights.

subject: Practicing Visualization
message: Visualizing positive outcomes helps me reduce anxiety.

subject: Watching Comedy Shows
message: Laughing at comedy shows helps me feel better.

subject: Trying New Recipes
message: Cooking new recipes is fun and relaxing.

subject: Taking a Warm Bath
message: A warm bath at night helps me sleep.

subject: Working on a Hobby
message: Engaging in a hobby helps distract me from stress.

subject: Volunteering
message: Helping others has a positive effect on my mood.

subject: Reducing Caffeine Intake
message: Reducing caffeine helps me feel less anxious.

subject: Stretching
message: Stretching relieves physical tension and stress.

subject: Drinking More Water
message: Staying hydrated helps me feel more energetic.
